pageContext.claim: “The World Health Organization has been a disaster. Everything they said was wrong. And they're China-centric. ll they do is they agree with China, whatever China wants to do. So our country, perhaps foolishly, in retrospect, has been paying $450 million a year to the World Health Organization. And China has been paying $38 million a year.”
pageContext.analysis: As of the end of 2019, China contributed $86 million to WHO — $75.8 million in assessed contributions and $10.2 million in voluntary contributions — while the U.S. gave $893 million — $236 million in assessed contributions and $656 million in voluntary contributions. Trump complains about the WHO but he repeatedly praised China's response to the coronavirus outbreak before the death toll started to mount in the USA. Then he looked for scapegoat.
